physical_appearance:\This is a light green cheongsam that is paired with a long-sleeved matching jacket
 also light green in colour. The cheongsam is sleeveless. Appliqued floral patterns can be seen on the front of the jacket
 but not on the sleeves. A collar is present on both the jacket and the cheongsam as well. There are two pairs of buttons
 in groups of three
 running vertically down the centre of the jacket. They are circular in shape
 having a golden interior and a dark brown exterior. There are no visible tears on the cheongsam and the jacket. There is a label tag that is titled \\Johnson\\ located at the collar of the jacket.\
subject_terms_1:dresses (garments) womenswear floral patterns tailor-made

subject_terms_3:Ethnic costume Chinese costume
sgcool_label_text:This is a sleeveless light green cheongsam with a matching jacket. The jacket is decorated with floral applique at the front
 collar and sleeves. The cheongsam is made in Hong Kong and has a tailor’s label
 “Johnson”.

metadata.title_text: Light green cheongsam with matching jacket
metadata.physical_appearance: "This is a light green cheongsam that is paired with a long-sleeved matching jacket, also light green in colour. The cheongsam is sleeveless. Appliqued floral patterns can be seen on the front of the jacket, but not on the sleeves. A collar is present on both the jacket and the cheongsam as well. There are two pairs of buttons, in groups of three, running vertically down the centre of the jacket. They are circular in shape, having a golden interior and a dark brown exterior. There are no visible tears on the cheongsam and the jacket. There is a label tag that is titled ""Johnson"" located at the collar of the jacket."
metadata.subject_terms_2: Qipao Ethnic costume Motifs Jackets Women's clothing Custom-made clothing
metadata.sgcool_label_text: This is a sleeveless light green cheongsam with a matching jacket. The jacket is decorated with floral applique at the front, collar and sleeves. The cheongsam is made in Hong Kong and has a tailor’s label, “Johnson”.
